        public static File saveToFile(InputStream inStream,
                              org.glassfish.jersey.media.multipart.FormDataContentDisposition fileDetails)
                       throws IOException
        Utility method to save InputStream data to target location/file
        Parameters:
        inStream - InputStream to be saved
        fileDetails - Further details on the file stored in inStream.
        Returns:
        File that contains content of inStream
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws IO Exception if file is not accesible

                             Charset encoding)
        Writes File from String
        Parameters:
